metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4436 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Apache Struts 2 before 2.3.29 and 2.5.x before 2.5.1 allow attackers to have unspecified impact via vectors related to improper action name clean up.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> The advisory says "Struts 2.0.0 - Struts 2.3.28.1" is affected but doesn't make a positive statement why those bounds.

criterions.comment: libstruts1.2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
